titles.title: Social Security Budget Integrity Act of 1987
A bill to amend title VII of the Social Security Act to provide for off-budget treatment of the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund beginning with fiscal year 1988.

bill.summary: 1/21/1987--Introduced. Social Security Budget Integrity Act of 1987 - Amends title VII (Administration) of the Social Security Act to exclude from Federal budget totals and limitations: (1) the receipts and disbursements of the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund; and (2) employment related social security taxes. Repeals a superseded provision of the Social Security Amendments of 1983 relating to budgetary treatment of social security trust operations as it relates to the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund.
